name: Jace Beleren
description: A master of mental magic and illusions.

description: A fiery pyromancer with an impulsive personality.

description: A necromancer who deals in death and power.

description: A leonine healer and protector of the weak.

description: A temporal mage skilled in manipulation.

name: Nicol Bolas
description: An elder dragon with unmatched cunning and power.

description: A stalwart protector and powerful warrior.

description: A vampire lord with a flair for the dramatic.

description: A golem with the power to shape worlds.

description: A nature-loving planeswalker deeply connected to the land.
